    About me

    I am currently a postdoctoral fellow in the SIMBIOTX team at the INRIA Saclay Center , where I work with Irène Vignon-Clémentel.

    Before that, I did my PhD under the supervision of Franck Nicoud and Simon Mendez at Institut Montpelliérain Alexander Grothendieck (UMR 5159, CNRS, Université de Montpellier) and of Ramiro Moreno from the society Spin Up in the context of a CIFRE convention (industrial PhD).

    Research interests

    - Biomechanics
    - Hemodynamics
    - Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
    - Medical imaging: Phase-Contrast Magnetic Resonance Imaging (PC-MRI)/4D Flow MRI
    - Numerical simulations
    - Flow phantoms
